entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
